/config.description: local storage for freshrss site files
/config.label: Config

VIRTUAL_HOST.description: Specify the virtual host name to add to the nginx proxy.
VIRTUAL_HOST.label: Virtual Host

LETSENCRYPT_HOST.description: Specify the virtual host name for letsencrypt - likely the same as the virtual host.
LETSENCRYPT_HOST.label: Letsencrypt Host

LETSENCRYPT_TEST.description: Specify using letsencrypt test or production certificate generation.
LETSENCRYPT_TEST.label: Letsencrypt test(true/false)

PUID.description: Enter a valid UID to run as. It must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PUID.label: UID

PGID.description: Enter a valid GID to use along with the above UID. It (or the above UID) must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PGID.label: GID

FreshRSS (NXR).description: FreshRSS is a free, self-hostable aggregator for rss feeds
FreshRSS (NXR).more_info: Note, this Rockon is designed to work with the Nginx Web reverse proxy and letsencrypt.
